name: Unicorn Solutions, Inc.
overview: Unicorn Solutions develops software for metadata management and offers enterprise information integration and management services. The companyâ€™s product enables enterprise to manage information technology, architect the business, and align information technology with the business, all without disruption. It provides metadata repository, ontology modeling, semantic mapping, active design services, active information technology management services, and federated business querying services. Unicorn Solutions was founded in 2001 and is based in New York City with additional offices in Reston, Virginia; Richmond, United Kingdom; and Jerusalem, Israel.

acquisition.source_description: IBM Accelerates Metadata Investments With Acquisition Of Unicorn Solutions
